Original: As you may have guessed, this is from
the Outland Count. He is looking for
a different body of water this time.
[Page]
You can learn more by talking to him
at the Grand Court. Now then, I shall
await your swift return.
Translation: As you may have guessed, this is from
the Outland Count. He is looking for
a different body of water this time.
[Page]
You can learn more by talking to him
at the Grand Court. Now then, I shall
await your swift return.

Original: From what the Outland Count told me,
it sounds like you settled the matter
expertly.
[Page]
But it is strange to think that the
source of our water actually lies in
the Scarlet Pillars.
[Page]
That means that while there, you can
drink the same water that we do here.
It is a sort of... river bond.
[Page]
At any rate, here is your reward.
Translation: From what the Outland Count told me,
it sounds like you settled the matter
expertly.
[Page]
But it is strange to think that the
source of our water actually lies in
the Scarlet Pillars.
[Page]
That means that while there, you can
drink the same water that we do here.
It is a sort of... river bond.
[Page]
At any rate, here is your reward.

Original: You want details on my request to find
the river's source? I'm glad to know
you've accepted it!
[Page]
Do you remember when I sent you in
search of the river's source here in
the Windy Plains? I haven't forgotten!
[Page]
What's more, I hear a similar river
flows through the [Color:5]Scarlet Pillars[Color:0],
the land you gave us access to.
[Page]
Judging by the maps I've seen, I have
come to believe that river must be
connected to ours in the Windy Plains.
[Page]
Find the true [Color:5]source[Color:0] of the river in
the Scarlet Pillars. And once you've
found it, report back here to me.
Translation: You want details on my request to find
the river's source? I'm glad to know
you've accepted it!
[Page]
Do you remember when I sent you in
search of the river's source here in
the Windy Plains? I haven't forgotten!
[Page]
What's more, I hear a similar river
flows through the [Color:5]Scarlet Pillars[Color:0],
the land you gave us access to.
[Page]
Judging by the maps I've seen, I have
come to believe that river must be
connected to ours in the Windy Plains.
[Page]
Find the true [Color:5]source[Color:0] of the river in
the Scarlet Pillars. And once you've
found it, report back here to me.

Original: Ah, hello, my friends! Did you find
the river's source in the Scarlet
Pillars?
Translation: Ah, hello, my friends! Did you find
the river's source in the Scarlet
Pillars?

Original: [Color:5]Did you find the river source?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information
Translation: [Color:5]Did you find the river source?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information

Original: I don't mind some gentle teasing, but
I am not a patient man. Those who see
patience as a virtue are mistaken.
[Page]
Do you disagree? Then consider that
I am now a Count, and think about it.
Translation: I don't mind some gentle teasing, but
I am not a patient man. Those who see
patience as a virtue are mistaken.
[Page]
Do you disagree? Then consider that
I am now a Count, and think about it.

Original: The river runs north to south. So if
you traverse [Color:5]the river[Color:0] from [Color:5]south to
north[Color:0], you're sure to find its [Color:5]source[Color:0].
[Page]
When you reach the river's end, have
a careful look around.
Translation: The river runs north to south. So if
you traverse [Color:5]the river[Color:0] from [Color:5]south to
north[Color:0], you're sure to find its [Color:5]source[Color:0].
[Page]
When you reach the river's end, have
a careful look around.

Original: Ah, splendid! Won't you show me on
your map where you found it?
Translation: Ah, splendid! Won't you show me on
your map where you found it?

Original: Very good. I'll send my scouts at once
to investigate those coordinates.
Translation: Very good. I'll send my scouts at once
to investigate those coordinates.

Original: Hmm... My scouts have told me that
there is nothing like a river source
at the spot you mentioned.
[Page]
I am very sensitive to these slights,
you realize. Next time, let's have an
accurate report on its location.
Translation: Hmm... My scouts have told me that
there is nothing like a river source
at the spot you mentioned.
[Page]
I am very sensitive to these slights,
you realize. Next time, let's have an
accurate report on its location.

Original: Ah, this is excellent! Just the thing
I expected from my trusted explorers!
The river's source was there indeed!
[Page]
With this new find, the soldiers and
explorers who travel to the Scarlet
Pillars will have guaranteed water.
[Page]
That will make things much more
efficient for them. Thank you once
more for your hard work, my friends.
[Page]
I have already informed the Dancing
Peacock of your success. You may go
and proudly claim your reward.
Translation: Ah, this is excellent! Just the thing
I expected from my trusted explorers!
The river's source was there indeed!
[Page]
With this new find, the soldiers and
explorers who travel to the Scarlet
Pillars will have guaranteed water.
[Page]
That will make things much more
efficient for them. Thank you once
more for your hard work, my friends.
[Page]
I have already informed the Dancing
Peacock of your success. You may go
and proudly claim your reward.

Original: What's the matter? I'm perfectly happy
with your work. Go on to the bar and
claim your just reward.
Translation: What's the matter? I'm perfectly happy
with your work. Go on to the bar and
claim your just reward.

Original: As you explore in your skyship, you
happen upon an enormous waterfall.
Overwhelmed, you halt the ship.
Translation: As you explore in your skyship, you
happen upon an enormous waterfall.
Overwhelmed, you halt the ship.

Original: Despite the unfathomable beauty of
this land's scenery, you decide to
move away from this area.
Translation: Despite the unfathomable beauty of
this land's scenery, you decide to
move away from this area.

Original: Keeping your request from the Count
in mind, you suspect the new [Color:5]source
of the river is up ahead[Color:0]...
Translation: Keeping your request from the Count
in mind, you suspect the new [Color:5]source
of the river is up ahead[Color:0]...

Original: You suddenly realize you have come to
the northernmost part of the river.
A cool breeze brushes by your cheek.
[Page]
You look below you to see crystal
clear water gushing out. It is the
source of the large river...!
Translation: You suddenly realize you have come to
the northernmost part of the river.
A cool breeze brushes by your cheek.
[Page]
You look below you to see crystal
clear water gushing out. It is the
source of the large river...!

Original: This must be what the Outland Count
hoped to see.
[Page]
Once you mark its location and report
back to the Grand Court, the request
will be fulfilled!
Translation: This must be what the Outland Count
hoped to see.
[Page]
Once you mark its location and report
back to the Grand Court, the request
will be fulfilled!

Original: The soothing landscape calms your
soul... With a refreshed mind, you
return to your explorations.
Translation: The soothing landscape calms your
soul... With a refreshed mind, you
return to your explorations.
